document.full_text: portugal's center-right social democrats (psd) began forming a coalition government with their traditional rightist allies on monday, promising to take tough austerity steps under the country's bailout program.
document.title: psd starts forming center-right portuguese government
lines_and_colors: portugal's center-right social democrats (psd) began forming a coalition government with their traditional rightist allies on monday, promising to take tough austerity steps under the country's bailout program.
